h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: These guys are in a league of their own, and you may even want to wait until your max health is restored if you're currently under the effect of the beguiling chant's curse, as this enemy can kill you extremely quickly. Using their large forearm blade, the Red-Haired Yaksha can employ many strong martial arts attacks, including a sweeping lunge to close the distance in a hurry.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 2)'.
The content is as follows:
These guys are in a league of their own, and you may even want to wait until your max health is restored if you're currently under the effect of the beguiling chant's curse, as this enemy can kill you extremely quickly. Using their large forearm blade, the Red-Haired Yaksha can employ many strong martial arts attacks, including a sweeping lunge to close the distance in a hurry.
